text:
[Verse]
I close my eyes now bright lights
Flying high on city nights
Stars above they shine so clear
Chasing dreams no room for fear

[Verse 2]
Laughter echoes skies of blue
Neon signs they guide me through
Bursts of colors paint the air
Everywhere dreams to share

[Chorus]
Dreams in colors take me there
Feel the rhythm life to spare
Dancing on a canvas bright
Through the day into the night

[Verse 3]
Clouds of cotton candy sweet
Jumping lines on stardust street
Happiness at every turn
Sparkling bright let it burn

[Bridge]
Hearts collide now pulses race
Every dream a sweet embrace
Wave of sound we ride so free
In this dream we cease to be

[Chorus]
Dreams in colors take me there
Feel the rhythm life to spare
Dancing on a canvas bright
Through the day into the night
title: Dreams in Colors
